import './TaskWindow.css' const TaskWindow = ({ showTaskWindow, taskData, buttonText, completeTask }) => { const goToLink = e => { e.stopPropagation() completeTask(taskData._id) window.location.href = taskData.link } return (
e.stopPropagation()}>

{taskData.title}

{taskData.reward}

) } export default TaskWindow
